sourcesContent:
<template>

</template>

<script>
import {ref} from "vue";

export default {
  name: "Battery_summary",
  props: ['canUpdate'],
  emits: ['subscribeToFields', 'updateData'],

  setup(props, {emit}) {
    let dataObject = ref({})
    let initialized = ref(false)

    let requiredFields = {
      "Motor 1": "battery/pack_temp_1/*",
    }

    emit("subscribeToFields", requiredFields)

    setInterval( ()=>{
      if (props.canUpdate) {
        emit("updateData", requiredFields, dataObject)
        if(!initialized.value) initialized.value = true
        console.log(dataObject)
      }
    } , 1000)

    return {dataObject, initialized}
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>

</style>
